name: Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games
blurb: Video gaming documentary filmed between 1989 & 1998.Feature length,90 minutes using lost & unseen footage including 22 Interviews.

rewards.reward: Digital download of Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games documentary.The 90 minute feature length production.The film voice-over & sub-titles will be in English,French,German,Italian, Spanish,Japanese,Portuguese,Norwegian, Swedish,Finnish & Danish.Please state which language you require.

Beautifully packaged digipak DVD extended 3 hour version.This will include the 90 minute Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games documentary plus a further 90 minutes of long play interviews and promotional videos not shown in the main film.All were made & filmed between 1989 & 1998.The DVD will have audio voice-over & sub-titles in English,French,German,Italian,Spanish, Japanese,Portuguese,Norwegian,Swedish, Finnish & Danish.A digital download of Fizz! will also be included,please state which language is required.

Beautifully packaged digipak Blu-Ray DVD extended 5 hour version.This will include the 90 minute Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games documentary plus a further 210 minutes of long play interviews,promotional videos,events & setup rushes not shown in the main film.All were made & filmed between 1989 & 1998.The DVD will have audio voice-over & sub-titles in English,French,German,Italian,Spanish, Japanese,Portuguese,Norwegian,Swedish, Finnish & Danish for the main documentary.A digital download of Fizz! will also be included,please state which language is required.\r\nAn audio podcast of the UK Nintendo Wii launch in London 2006 is also included.An 8 minute high quality audio featuring interviews with sporting icons boxer Rickie Hatton,former Arsenal & England soccer star Ian Wright and tennis player Pat Cash.They discuss gaming & lifestyle issues,Ian Wright also reveals which of his former England team mates used to spend 3 long hours playing Tomb Raider back in the 1990's.The audio podcast is English language only.

YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS of the main 90 minute Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games documentary.Plus a copy of the Blu-Ray DVD extended 5 hour version.This will include the 90 minute Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games documentary plus a further 210 minutes of long play interviews,promotional videos,events & setup rushes not shown in the main film.All were made & filmed between 1989 & 1998.The DVD will have audio voice-over & sub-titles in English,French,German,Italian,Spanish, Japanese,Portuguese,Norwegian,Swedish, Finnish & Danish for the main documentary.A digital download of Fizz! will also be included,please state which language is required.\r\nAn audio podcast of the UK Nintendo Wii launch in London 2006 is also included.An 8 minute high quality audio featuring interviews with sporting icons boxer Rickie Hatton,former Arsenal & England soccer star Ian Wright and tennis player Pat Cash.They discuss gaming & lifestyle issues,Ian Wright also reveals which of his former England team mates used to spend 3 long hours playing Tomb Raider back in the 1990's.

Original Archive Master Tapes & digital conversion archive & sundry 1980's original print magazines.29 original broadcast master tapes containing footage from 1989 to 1998.Betacam SP,M2,BVU SP & VHS.All are original tapes,now obsolete up to 25 years old.
1TB hard drive containing all the digital conversions,masters,originals and enhanced footage. 
Original Zzap 64 magazines,no.4 August 1985,no.10 January 1986.ACE magazine editions 1,2,& 3.October to December 1987.
Full Blu Ray 5 hour of Fizz! The Surge Of Video Games.
Name in the credits.
Audio podcast of the UK Nintendo Wii launch.
All of the original Fizz documentary voice overs.
All of the digital editions.
This would not include any re-publishing rights.These can be obtained under license from the copyright holder.
